attributes.action: Cancel GCSEs for Year 10s and replace with Coursework or Provide more Resources
attributes.additional_details: Not having school for a long period of time also meaning less time for studying means carrying on and not cancelling exams for the next year's Year 11 (2021/2022) will lead to higher rates of mental health issues such as stress, anxiety and depression.
attributes.background: To cancel GCSEs for Year 10s (2020/2021) and to replace with Coursework related to the curriculum instead of exams. If not, to provide more help and resources to the students.
